title: Enhancing the stretchability of two-dimensional materials through kirigami: a molecular dynamics study on tungsten disulfide
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24483-24491
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04814H, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
K. Dey, S. Shahriar, M. A. R. Anan, P. Malakar, M. M. Rahman, M. M. Chowdhury
Kirigami patterns on monolayer WS2 enhance stretchability and tailor mechanical properties. MD simulations show increased tensile strain, reduced strength, and optimal performance from adjusted overlap ratio, cut density, and length-to-width ratios.
